name.jp: マルティニークのレポート
name.sp: Prueba de la División del Continente

description.en: Quest Item: Proof that proves the continents of Madrigal seperated at one time.
description.ar: Quest Item: Proof that proves the continents of Madrigal seperated at one time.
description.br: (Quest) Prova de que os continentes de Madrigal se separaram em algum tempo.
description.cns: 大陆被分裂的主要证据资料
description.de: (Questitem) Eine Aufzeichnung, welche die Hypothese von Martinyc für den Grund des zerbrochenen Kontinents belegt.
description.fi: Quest Item: Proof that proves the continents of Madrigal seperated at one time.
description.fil: Quest Item: Proof that proves the continents of Madrigal seperated at one time.
description.fr: Données prouvant la théorie de Martinyc sur la séparation des continents de Madrigal.
description.id: Item Quest: Bukti yang membuktikan benua Madrigal terpisah pada satu waktu.
description.it: Quest Item: Proof that proves the continents of Madrigal seperated at one time.
description.jp: 様々な資料をもとに、大陸が分裂した仮説を綴ったマルティニークのレポート。（クエストアイテム）
description.kr: 대륙이 갈라진 정확한 연유를 작성한 자료로 마르티닉이 자신의 가설을 입증할 수 있는 중요한 증거이다.
description.nl: Quest Item: Proof that proves the continents of Madrigal seperated at one time.
description.pl: Quest Item: Proof that proves the continents of Madrigal seperated at one time.
description.ru: Ключевой предмет: доказательство того, что когда-то острова Мадригала составляли единый материк.
description.sp: Objeto de Misión: Prueba que evidencia que los continentes de Madrigal se separaron hace tiempo.
description.sw: Quest Item: Proof that proves the continents of Madrigal seperated at one time.
description.th: Quest Item: หลักฐานที่พิสูจน์ทวีปของ Madrigal ที่แยกจากกันในคราวเดียว
description.tw: [任務道具]證明馬德利賈大陸被分裂的主要證據資料。
description.vi: Vật phẩm nhiệm vụ: Bằng chứng chứng minh các lục địa của Madrigal được tách biệt cùng một lúc.
